Name: A Way Back
About the game: Clean the islands from nasty plastic by solving challenging puzzles and help a little penguin finding A Way Back home! Cute hand-drawn art by Jenya 'lodfu' Kuzmenko Challenging puzzles by Timur 'haze' Chanturia A lovely original soundtrack by Tom 'TKIMUSE' Kinsella
